title: Add run-record component for displaying RunRecord details
description:
Create a new Lit component run-record.ts to display RunRecord data with collapsible sections.

Sections to display:
- Summary: model, session ID, success/error status, duration
- Metrics: input/output/cache tokens, cost
- Output: agent output text (collapsible)
- Thinking: agent thinking (collapsible)
- Tools: list of tool calls with name, input preview, duration
- Verification: verification status and output if present

Use existing patterns from tick-detail-drawer.ts collapsible sections.
Use Shoelace components (sl-details, sl-badge, sl-icon).
Style with Catppuccin Mocha theme colors.

Run: npm test -- --grep 'run-record'
acceptance_criteria: Component renders RunRecord data with all sections
closed_reason: Created run-record.ts Lit component with collapsible sl-details sections. Component displays RunRecord data with Summary (model, session ID, status, duration), Metrics (tokens, cost), Output, Thinking, Tools list, and Verification sections. Uses Catppuccin Mocha theme colors. Added sl-details import to main.ts.
